data.persona: I live in the village with other people. I am a citizen and work normal jobs in the town. I am a productive member of society.
data.description:
You are in the the whipping station.
the whipping station is just a large wooden platform that serves to embarrass the peasant villagers that sin, they also hang adulterers and homosexuals.
There's a stone, a knife, a rope, a platform, a whip, and a wooden platform here.
The executioner is here.

You are carrying a Canteen.
data.goal: steal a crystal ball from executioner

data.short_motivation: I have to recover the crystal ball
data.mid_motivation: I want to resell the crystal ball; it belonged to my previous buyer who was executed by the executioner
data.long_motivation: I realize the importance of little but consistent sales that aggregate into a larger income at the end of the season
